snippet.title: CTHON Trailer 2 - A Roguelike Shooter Made With GameMaker
snippet.description:
Embark - if you dare - upon a desperate battle against the unknown horrors of the beyond; featuring roguelike elements, including procedural generation and permanent death, CTHON seamlessly blends visceral combat with strategic character building.

Want to see more? Check these out!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Co7-c5Lzezk
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BsBvRO1UqsU

CTHON is available for purchase on itch: https://gravitygames.itch.io/cthon

and on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/595100

Music Credits
dingo1 - Deep Space (Cinematic Soundscape) and Hell March (Industrial Electronic Loop)
http://freesound.org/people/dingo1/
